audioText: Il faut être très prudent en traversant cette route dangereuse car les automobilistes roulent souvent à grande vitesse.
question: Why should one be careful when crossing this road?
options: Because drivers often travel at high speed
Because the road surface is slippery and unstable
Because pedestrian crossings are poorly marked
explanation: The text states 'Il faut être très prudent en traversant cette route dangereuse car les automobilistes roulent souvent à grande vitesse.' - One must be very careful when crossing this dangerous road because drivers often travel at high speed. 'Prudent' means careful, cautious, or wise.
